Reviews.Title: “Needs lots of updating!”
Reviews.Author: Cinnilouwho
Reviews.Content: Our room key wouldn't work, the lady came up and tried 2 other ones and then let us in w/ a master key! Good thing we just needed some rest and didn't need to come and go as we had no key!!!! They look like they are trying to update it but it needs A LOT of work! Room was comfortable with lots of room to move around, outside entrance & big window made for a chilly room but heater seemed to catch up quickly. Shower was nice but tub left something to be desired, it looked like they tried to paint it and it was pealing off. If you just need a place to lay your head and get some zzz's this will do. It's nothing to write home about!!!!! It was easy to find off the expressway and their are other motels available in the area if you decide this isn't what you're looking for.

Reviews.Title: “Old and crappy”
Reviews.Author: gbtrek
Reviews.Content: Bad location, dim parking lot. Old, worn out Motel with all rooms having outside entrance. Security issues with people sitting outside rooms and loitering around the grounds. Not a nice area for a family.

Reviews.Title: “Decent, but lacking”
Reviews.Author: Waltermax8
Reviews.Content: Just checked into this hotel and immediately found out they didn't have refrigerators in rooms and it is very hot outside and I carry food. Old property. Lots of rotting wood on stairs, room well-fitted. Nice tv--33 channels. They're trying, but it's a very old property. Very fast wifi (15mbps). For the price, you can find better.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible”
Reviews.Author: dewalsh
Reviews.Content: We reserved this hotel online, and when we arrived, they had no record of our reservation. Though our credit card had been charged (even though we had not stayed yet), the clerk insisted that we pay again and work out the details later. The clerk, also the manager, called the online reservation center, and they informed him that we did indeed have a reservation. However, he was instructed to wait until he received email confirmation before giving us a room. Once again, he insisted we pay again. After 30 minutes, I asked to cancel the reservation. However, since it was after 3PM, I would have to be charged for the room even though I was no longer willing to stay. After another 30 minutes of arguing with a salesman online, I was given a refund. We left.

Reviews.Title: “Its clean...don't worry about the other reviews”
Reviews.Author: kerry38138
Reviews.Content: I had stayed at this hotel several times before...the last time being in May of 2009, and after reading some other reviews I was wondering if I should stay there again. I decided to take a chance and was pleasantly surprised, room was clean and furnishing were in good condition including the carpet. I will stay here again.....great value and close to plenty of dining choices and shopping. The only "gripe" I had was limited choice of TV channels but I was told they were updating their system and the digital boxes hadn't come in yet.

Reviews.Title: “DISGUSTING!”
Reviews.Author: BenMarisaJJ
Reviews.Content: My husband, 2 year old son, father-in-law, and I were driving from Wisconsin to South Carolina. We wanted to stop halfway and calculated that we would get there around between 1:00am and 2:00am. We didn't want anything fancy - just a place to lay our heads since we were getting up at 7:00am to head back on the road. We walked in, exhausted, and you could barely breath in the room. It was so humid and reeked of must and mold. We gathered as many "clean" towels as we could and made my son sleep on those because the bedding was horribly dirty. The next morning, the tub had black hair/dirt/mold in it, and I was was the 3rd one to take a shower! My father-in-law (who was the first one) said he felt dirtier after the shower than he did before it! I would have rather had spent an extra $30 for a decent room in southern Indy that stay in this dirt-infested hotel again!

Reviews.Title: “Pick a different hotel”
Reviews.Author: IowaRdtripper
Reviews.Content: We selected this hotel as a stopover from Iowa to Florida and liked the location south of Indianapolis to start the next day. I called ahead for reservations and had trouble with communicating with the reservation clerk over the phone. I nearly missed the hotel as there is no street signage, just a small sign on a sidewall easily missed as there is a Waffle House fronting the streetside. Nevertheless, the clerk at check-in (after midnight) was efficient and courteous. unfortunately, our room quality was very poor. The wall heater did not work, the lights over the bed did not turn on, the tv did not work and the bathroom was barely a closet. The continental breakfast is far below par for today's basic hotel standards. Problems with the room were reported upon checkout and were barely acknowledged. Were we doing anything more than a six hour stop, we would not have kept the room.

Reviews.Title: “Competently run and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Cable_Hogue
Reviews.Content: Another good mark for Super 8. The beds were comfortable, but the bathroom was great. The counter by the sink was huge! My favorite amenity. The sink and toilet were also not in the same room! Another amenity I really like. The staff was also helpful, which isn't always true at budget properties. But the best feature of this motel is the Waffle House immediately on the other side of the building. Forget the free breakfast here. On the down side, the wireless signal is weak--though workable--on the far end of the motel. If I go back to Indianapolis for work, I'll be returning.

HotelInfo.Name: Super 8 Indianapolis
HotelInfo.Address: 4033 East Southport Rd, Indianapolis, IN 45237
